title: undire
author: undire
content: Today I wanted to publish, something I have been working on for a few weeks, gobrute.Features: Generation of password list, muilti word or single  Local check: check address list compared to the addresses generated with there private keys  Scrape: uses a password list you supply to generate there privatekeys  Balance check: checks balance of the list of privatekeys, display total txs, addresses with balances, total__version__: 1.0.1__author__: 0x251https://github.com/0x251/gobruteSuggestion: go run gobrute.go
